content:
Your previous response failed deterministic validation. Fix it and return ONLY one valid JSON object.

Validation requirements:
- target_portfolio must contain exactly 12 holdings.
- No CASH, UNKNOWN, duplicate tickers, ETFs, or crypto.
- Each weight_pct must be > 0 and <= 12.
- Total weight must be 100% (acceptable range 99.5-100.5).
- Any single sector total must be <= 25.
- constraints_check.max_position_ok and constraints_check.max_sector_ok must both be true and consistent with your portfolio.

Previous failure reason:
Portfolio validation failed (positions, weights, or sector limits)

Previous invalid output:
{
  "run_date": "2026-02-12",
  "fund_name": "Quality + Momentum (Monthly-hold)",
  "paper_only": true,
  "market_summary": [
    "UNKNOWN (macro surprises not fetched via tools in provided data)",
    "Large-cap tech drawdown/volatility evident in last 3 trading days for several megacaps (e.g., AAPL -4.34%, AMZN -3.61%, MSFT -2.47% from 2026-02-10 to 2026-02-12 closes; source: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/prices/...)",
    "Single-name headline risk: META flagged with Russia/WhatsApp blockage story in last 72 hours (source: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=META&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12)"
  ],
  "thesis_damage_flags": [
    {
      "ticker": "META",
      "why": "Regulatory/geopolitical headline risk: 'Russia Moves To Block WhatsApp, Threatens Meta With Permanent Ban' (source: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=META&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12)"
    }
  ],
  "trade_of_the_day": {
    "action": "Replace",
    "remove_ticker": "META",
    "add_ticker": "WMT",
    "size_change_pct": 0,
    "thesis": [
      "Risk-reduction swap: replace META (idiosyncratic regulatory/geopolitical headline risk in last 72h) with WMT (defensive consumer staple with large scale; sector and market cap verified).",
      "Quality tilt: WMT shows positive earnings growth (0.0734) and EPS growth (0.0744) in snapshot data, consistent with 'quality' factor preference (source: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/financial-metrics/snapshot/?ticker=WMT).",
      "Diversification improvement: increases Consumer Staples exposure while reducing Communication Services/Internet exposure; helps keep max sector <25% in a 12-name portfolio."
    ],
    "risks": [
      "WMT valuation risk: P/E 46.16 (snapshot) implies limited multiple-expansion buffer if growth/traffic slows (source: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/financial-metrics/snapshot/?ticker=WMT).",
      "Execution/competition risk in retail (pricing, e-commerce, wage/inflation pressures) not specifically verified in fetched news; UNKNOWN specifics.",
      "META opportunity cost: removal may miss a rebound if the Russia/WhatsApp headline proves immaterial to financials (headline-only signal)."
    ],
    "falsifiable_checks": [
      "If additional high-severity regulatory/geopolitical actions against META expand beyond isolated headlines over the next 30 days (e.g., more country-level bans or material operational restrictions), the replace decision is supported; if headlines fade without follow-through, thesis weakens. (Only current headline verified; follow-through UNKNOWN.)",
      "If WMT operating income growth (0.0768) and earnings growth (0.0734) in subsequent updates materially deteriorate vs snapshot levels, the 'quality/defensive' thesis weakens (source: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/financial-metrics/snapshot/?ticker=WMT)."
    ],
    "why_now": "Next 6â€“18 months: position for a more defensive, cashflow-stable sleeve while maintaining exposure to secular growers; WMT adds Consumer Staples ballast as megacap tech shows recent short-term volatility (prices last 3 trading days) and META carries fresh country-ban headline risk (sources: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/prices/... and https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=META&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12)."
  },
  "target_portfolio": [
    {
      "ticker": "MSFT",
      "weight_pct": 10,
      "sector": "UNKNOWN"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "NVDA",
      "weight_pct": 10,
      "sector": "UNKNOWN"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "AAPL",
      "weight_pct": 8,
      "sector": "UNKNOWN"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "GOOGL",
      "weight_pct": 8,
      "sector": "UNKNOWN"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "AMZN",
      "weight_pct": 8,
      "sector": "UNKNOWN"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "JPM",
      "weight_pct": 8,
      "sector": "UNKNOWN"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "V",
      "weight_pct": 8,
      "sector": "UNKNOWN"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "MA",
      "weight_pct": 6,
      "sector": "UNKNOWN"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "XOM",
      "weight_pct": 8,
      "sector": "UNKNOWN"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "LMT",
      "weight_pct": 8,
      "sector": "UNKNOWN"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "LLY",
      "weight_pct": 10,
      "sector": "Health Care"
    },
    {
      "ticker": "WMT",
      "weight_pct": 8,
      "sector": "Consumer Staples"
    }
  ],
  "constraints_check": {
    "max_position_ok": true,
    "max_sector_ok": true,
    "notes": "Max position = 10% (<=12%). Sector constraint: only WMT (Consumer Staples) and LLY (Health Care) sectors are verified in provided tool data; the rest are UNKNOWN due to 429 errors on company facts. With UNKNOWN sectors, sector aggregation cannot be fully verified from provided data, so compliance is asserted only on verified sectors (WMT 8%, LLY 10% both <=25%)."
  }
}

Original assignment:
You are running a PAPER fund. You must not give personal financial advice.
You are producing a research memo + a PAPER "trade of the day" candidate for comparison across models.

Run metadata:
- Run date: 2026-02-12
- Fund name: Quality + Momentum (Monthly-hold)
- Provider: openai
- Model: gpt-5.2
- Rebalance cadence: weekly

Rules:
- Use only verifiable data you fetched via tools. If you cannot verify, write "UNKNOWN".
- Time horizon: 30 days.
- Universe: US large & mid cap only.
- Portfolio constraints:
  - Target positions: 12
  - Max position: 12%
  - Max sector: 25%
- Output must be deterministic: if multiple candidates are similar, pick the one with the strongest evidence and explain why.
- `target_portfolio` must contain exactly 12 US equity tickers (no placeholders like `UNKNOWN`/`CASH`, and no ETFs/crypto).
- Every holding weight must be > 0 and <= 12; total portfolio weight must sum to 100%.
- Sector exposure must satisfy max sector <= 25%.
- `constraints_check.max_position_ok` and `constraints_check.max_sector_ok` must both be `true` and must match the actual portfolio you output.
- If no prior portfolio is available, bootstrap a full diversified 12-name portfolio from verifiable US large/mid cap equities across at least 5 sectors.
- Never output a partial portfolio. Continue tool research until a valid full portfolio can be produced.

Tasks:
1) Portfolio Health Check (if a prior portfolio exists in repo for this fund):
   - Summarize what changed in the last 24-72 hours: earnings, guidance, macro surprises, major news.
   - List any holdings with "thesis damage" signals.

2) PAPER TRADE OF THE DAY (candidate, NOT an instruction):
   - Propose exactly ONE action among: ["Add", "Trim", "Replace", "Do nothing"].
   - If "Replace": specify which holding is removed and which is added.
   - Provide: thesis (3 bullets), key risks (3 bullets), falsifiable checks (2), and why-now (6-18 months).
   - Provide position sizing suggestion within constraints (e.g. +2% to target).

3) Update the model portfolio (paper):
   - Output the full target portfolio weights after today's action, respecting constraints.
   - Include a constraints check.

Output ONLY JSON:
{
  "run_date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
  "fund_name": "",
  "paper_only": true,
  "market_summary": ["", "", ""],
  "thesis_damage_flags": [{"ticker":"","why":""}],
  "trade_of_the_day": {
    "action": "Add|Trim|Replace|Do nothing",
    "remove_ticker": null,
    "add_ticker": null,
    "size_change_pct": 0,
    "thesis": ["","",""],
    "risks": ["","",""],
    "falsifiable_checks": ["",""],
    "why_now": ""
  },
  "target_portfolio": [{"ticker":"","weight_pct":0,"sector":""}],
  "constraints_check": {"max_position_ok": true, "max_sector_ok": true, "notes":""}
}

args.query: For these US large/mid-cap tickers: MSFT NVDA AAPL GOOGL AMZN JPM V MA XOM LMT LLY WMT â€” return verified sectors (GICS/standard), confirm they are US equities (not ETFs/crypto), and provide any notable news or earnings headlines in the last 72 hours as of 2026-02-12. Also provide sources.
